title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 211.7 - Reporting to dressing rooms
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 211.7 - Reporting to dressing rooms

State Regulations

All boxers participating at a boxing program shall report to
the designated dressing room of the premises no later than one and one half
hours before the scheduled commencement of the first bout, except the
contestants in the main bout, who may report at or before one hour before the
scheduled commencement of the first bout. All boxers shall remain in their
dressing rooms until directed to the ring by the Commission representative in
charge. Notes

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
